content: measurer into your bottom piece with the tape coming out of the opening / slit we left open i always set the tape with the button on the bottom but it doesn t really matter if it s face up the left ear will hide the tape and you ll 3 press his nose to retract the tape place your face piece on these pieces so the tape comes out where one of the ears will sit sew the face piece to the bottom piece keeping the tape measurer inside both pieces make sure your face is lining up with where the ears are going to be sitting before you start sewing attach one ear to the end of the tape measurer that is sticking out the slit on the side by sticking it into the opening use the tail that was left from the ear and run 4 it through the stitches around the opening and tighten it a bit attach the other ear on the opposite side by sewing it on 5 see below about how to attach the mane page 4 of 8 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com putting it all together here all the pieces laying out together this is how the yarn looks separated into two strands i started with the nose just going over and over the center trying to make it look triangular page 5 of 8 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com from there i made the mouth or smile and added the sew on google eyes i then anchored the end and weaved it in on the back side you can see here i m trying to line up the face with where i want the ears to be since the right ear will be hiding the end of the tape measurer then i started to sew it together sew through both loops on the bottom of the piece and the back loop only on the top piece you want to be able to crochet the mane in the front loops later on page 6 of 8 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com for the right ear i threaded the tail through the stitches where i bound off stuck the tape measurer into the opening then tightened it as tight as possible then made a knot and wove in the tail end and cut it off sew the other ear in place on the other side of the head to start the mane using gold attach the gold yarn somewhere on the head i started at the bottom of the face in the back loops you left open when sewing the pieces together earlier single_crochet in the first loop then chain 5 *single_crochet in the next stitch and chain 5* repeat from * to * in each loop all the way around at the end slip_stitch to the first stitch and bind off page 7 of 8
